overview: The movie tells, in a fun and reflective way, the rivalry between two angels in the heavenly office. Angeriel, a benevolent angel who always seeks to help people, is opposed to his partner Sataninha, a grumpy, unscrupulous being full of tricks to win any competition. Like a tug-of-war back and forth, Angeriel and Sataninha will compete on earth for the emotions of each human.
tagline: The angel who executes the best game strategy and influence over these people will win.
title: Tug of War
